function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete reporting of intervention follow-up time in longitudinal studies","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Ensure complete and accurate reporting of intervention follow-up time in longitudinal studies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, study authors","Owner":"Researchers, study authors"},{"Description":"Low quality score of some studies, including cross-sectional studies","Impact":"Reduced reliability of evidence and findings","Mitigation":"Conduct higher quality studies, prioritize longitudinal designs, and ensure rigorous data collection","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, study authors","Owner":"Researchers, study authors"},{"Description":"Lack of assessment on the effectiveness of environmental adjustments in workplace COVID-19 IPC measures","Impact":"Potential oversight of important control measures for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct studies and assessments specifically focused on the effectiveness of environmental adjustments","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"}]}
